projectPurpose: To provide a high-level emulation environment for running applications originally designed for older versions of iPhone OS.
mainFeatures: High-level emulation of iPhone OS applications
Focus on compatibility with older iPhone OS apps

alternatives.name: Xcode Simulator
alternatives.license: Proprietary (Included with Xcode, which is free)
mainFeatures: High accuracy for development and testing
Supports various iOS versions and devices

alternatives.name: Appetize.io
alternatives.license: Proprietary (Free plan with limitations, paid plans)
mainFeatures: Useful for app demos and testing

alternatives.name: Smartface
mainFeatures: Supports both iOS and Android emulation

alternatives.name: iPadian
mainFeatures: Runs a curated selection of apps and games

alternatives.name: Remoted iOS Simulator for Windows
mainFeatures: Allows iOS app testing on Windows

alternatives.name: Corellium
mainFeatures: Used for security testing and research

alternatives.name: PlayCover
mainFeatures: Runs iOS apps/games natively on Apple Silicon

marketPositioning: touchHLE is positioned as a niche, high-level emulator focused specifically on preserving and running applications from the early iPhone OS era. Unlike general-purpose development simulators (like Xcode Simulator) or broader emulation platforms, its core value lies in providing compatibility for legacy iPhone OS software. Its open-source nature further emphasizes a community-driven effort towards software history preservation, differentiating it from commercial or enterprise-focused virtualization solutions.
